channel.title: ••how do i make an item auto-spawn?••
channel.description: Ok, so I have a party room on my server. I want to make party hats just spawn out of no where like every 15 seconds. How do I do this?

item.title: ••how do i make an item auto-spawn?••
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[code]// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(391, 3066, 3952, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // manta ray
ItemHandler.addItem(391, 3253, 3462, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // manta ray
ItemHandler.addItem(391, 3096, 3956, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // manta ray
ItemHandler.addItem(1917, 3252, 3439, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Light beer
ItemHandler.addItem(3803, 3250, 3422, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Strong beer
ItemHandler.addItem(3801, 3269, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Keg of beer
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 3098, 3099, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // bronze axe
ItemHandler.addItem(590, 3098, 3100, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tinderbox
spawntimer = 100;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}[/code]

item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:231504”]I didnt add this code in my files, because my source is hard to make money, but there is this.

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("your command name here")&& playerRights >= P rights here){ ItemHandler.addItem(1038, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1040, absX+1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1042, absX-1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1044, absX+1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1046, absX-1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1048, absX+1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1057, absX-1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1050, absX, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1055, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1053, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); }[/quote]
Ok, how do I add it? Everytime I put something, I get like 100 errors. Give me an example.
